description:
Mia Gold shows up to Hardcore Gangbang for her first gangbang ever!
To celebrate, she takes on the Takedown Challenge - if she can get out of the house, she gets $1000. For every piece of clothing she can keep on, she gets $1000.
The tricky part is, to win she has to get past five guys who are ready to fuck her brains out.
Will she make it? No.
title: Mia Gold Takes on the Takedown Challenge...
